responseText: You see, that old girl's been weathering the tides since the folk left Verra I'd reckon. She's a rat's age old and older, and she's falling apart! I seen her branches break off in the winds and fall into the sea. When the storms come in off the ocean, the branches blow inland too. I seen it. I want to get my mitts on some, I reckon - easily a dozen of 'em.
name: SQ_Lionhold_0002_Fragments_Jimson_8_Response
